name: Colombo International Conference on Social Science & Humanities (ICSSH), 23-24 October 2018, Sri Lanka
content: Conference Name: Colombo International Conference on Social Science & Humanities (ICSSH), 23-24 October 2018, Sri Lanka Conference Dates: 23-24 October 2018 Conference Venue: Galle Face Hotel, Colombo, Sri Lanka Deadline for Abstract/Paper Submissions: 21 October 2018 Contact E-Mail ID: info@gahssr.org GAHSSR President: Merissa Ocampo PhD. Language: English (Vernacular Session, e.g., Sinhalese, Tamil, Persian, Bahasa, Thai, European Languages, Chinese, will be organized for minimum 5 or more participants of particular language) (Only english language, full-length, original papers will be considered for publication in conference journals)
